resources.string: For confirmation\n purposes, please\nre-enter the Subject ID.
By signing in you agree to our Privacy Policy.

The following section will ask you questions in regards to your sleep and wake behaviour on work- and work-free days.\n\nPlease estimate an average of your normal sleep behaviour over the past 6 weeks when you were able to follow your usual routines.
I have been a shift- or night-worker in the past three months.
Please answer all of the following questions even if you do not work 7 days per week.\n\nPlease don\'t forget to indicate AM or PM.
This is NOT when you go to bed.
This is NOT when you get out of bed.
On work-free days when I don\'t use an alarm clock, I normally fall asleep at:
On work-free days when I don\'t use an alarm clock, I normally wake up at:
The following questions will ask you about sleep specific to last night and waking this morning.
These questions will briefly ask you about what is happening around you right now in this moment.
Who is with you right now?
How would you rate your overall mood right now?
How would you rate how you feel right now?
In the past 5 minutes, what were you mostly doing?
In this test you will see a 5 x 5 grid with three items placed in that grid.\n\nStudy the grid and try to remember the location of the three items.
You will then do a different task where you will touch all the letter “F”s that you find as quickly as you can.
Finally, you will be shown a blank grid. Tap the boxes where the items were previously located.\n\nPress Begin to start the test.
Try to remember the location of the items!
Please sign your initials on the line below to verify your identity.
By signing my initials on the line below, I attest that I completed these tests.

Thanks!

Were you interrupted or did you have to stop while taking any of these tests?
You\'ll get a notification later today when your next test is available.
There are no more tests to take.
There are no tests to take right now. Your next testing cycle will be {DATE1} through {DATE2}.
Thanks for your hard work. We\'ll notify you tomorrow with your next test.
You finished this test, ready for the next one?
You will now start the test. You will see an item and two prices. Please select the price that matches the item you studied.
What was the price of the
Next: Tap on the location of the items
You will see three pairs of symbols at the top of the screen and two pairs at the bottom.\n\nAs quickly as you can, tap the pair at the bottom of the screen that matches one of the pairs at the top.
Which pair below matches one of the pairs on the top?

You will now complete three quick tests. 

You cannot pause this test once it has been started.
 
Press Next to begin.
What time did you get in bed last night?
How long did it take you to fall asleep last night?
How many times did you wake up for 5 minutes or longer?
What time did you wake up this morning?
What time did you get out of bed this morning?
How would you rate the quality of your sleep?
When do you usually wake up on Monday?
When do you usually go to bed on Monday?
Do you usually wake up around {TIME1} and go to bed around {TIME2} on Tuesday - Friday ?
When do you usually wake up on Tuesday?
When do you usually go to bed on Tuesday?
When do you usually wake up on Wednesday?
When do you usually go to bed on Wednesday?
When do you usually wake up on Thursday?
When do you usually go to bed on Thursday?
When do you usually wake up on Friday?
When do you usually go to bed on Friday?
When do you usually wake up on Saturday?
When do you usually go to bed on Saturday?
When do you usually wake up on Sunday?
When do you usually go to bed on Sunday?
First, we\'ll ask you a few questions to help us determine when to send you those notifications.\n\nYou will only receive notifications during your waking hours.
I NEED TO ADJUST MY START DATE
It’s time to take a quick test!
You\'ve missed your tests. If you\'re unable \nto finish this week, please contact your site \ncoordinator.
Please confirm your next testing start date.

We’ll show you some shopping items and prices.\n\nPlease decide if the displayed price is a good bargain for that item. The pair will only remain on the screen for a short time, so please make your decision quickly and pay close attention.
Your next test will be on {DATE}.
You Will Now Complete 3 Quick Tests
You cannot pause a test once it has been started. You cannot go back to the previous screen.

If you have questions about this app, difficulties using the app, or any concerns about the study, please contact the study Investigator at the telephone number listed on the first page of your informed consent document.
Sorry, our app is currently experiencing issues. Please try again later.
Invalid Subject ID or Site Code
Please set a minimum of 4 hours of wake time.
Your next testing cycle will be {START} through {END}.
Please confirm these testing dates or adjust your schedule.
Your next week of testing begins in one month, on {DATE}. You may adjust this schedule up to 7 days.
Reminder: Your next testing cycle starts in one week. Tap to confirm or reschedule.
Reminder: Your next testing cycle begins tomorrow. Tap to confirm or reschedule.
